title: Restuarant Page Website
description: A modern and responsive coffee shop landing page built using React and CSS.

title: Student Dashboard Website
description: A clean and responsive fitness trainer website designed with React and Tailwind CSS.

title: Service Marketplace App
description: A service marketplace app that connects users with professionals for various services.

title: Bank Management System (Java JDBC)
description: A console-based banking system using Java and JDBC with features like account creation, deposit, withdrawal, balance check, and secure transaction handling with rollback.

title: Inventory Management System (Java JDBC)
description: A Java-based inventory management application supporting product CRUD operations, stock tracking, and database integration using JDBC.

title: Advanced Bus Reservation System (Java JDBC)
description: An advanced console-based bus reservation system using Java and JDBC with features like user auth, route management, seat booking, ticketing, and transaction safety.
